graph_title: 성인 인구중 심각한 수준의 식량불안 경험 현황
indicator_name: 식량불안경험척도(FIES) 기준으로 중간 또는 심각한 수준의 식량불안 경험인구 비율
target_name: 2030년까지 기아를 종식시키고 모든 사람, 특히 영·유아를 포함한 빈곤층 및 취약계층이 안전하고 영양가 있으며 충분한 식량에 접근할 수 있도록 보장

en.target_name: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round
en.computation_definitions:
National data (Type1)
This is the national produced statistics in the ROK that best corresponds to the definition of UN SDGs indicators.
Download the national metadata file for more information.
en.indicator_name: Prevalence of moderate or severe food insecurity in the population, based on the Food Insecurity Experience Scale (FIES)
en.global_indicator_name: Prevalence of moderate or severe food insecurity in the population, based on the Food Insecurity Experience Scale (FIES)
en.data_name: Percent of households without food security
en.indicator_definition:
The percent of households without food security measures the Percent of respondents, who are the primary buyers of food for their household, answering at 1) and 2) when asked about their family food life in the last 12 months.
1) my family could have food in enough quantities and varieties
2) my family could have food in enough quantities but lacked variety
en.statistics_name: Korea National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey
en.computation_calculations: Interviews with household members aged 1 and over nationwide
en.graph_title: Percent of households without food security
en.source_organisation_1: Division of Health and Nutrition Survey and Analysis, Bureau of Chronic Disease Prevention and Control, Korea Disease Control and Prevention Agency
